name: Dragon Rider (itch)
description:
Who doesn't want to own a dragon?

In this game you have such a chance. I need to aware you that it is a big responsibility!

The world is up side down. The Dragon Master cursed all dragon eggs. Only evil, red dragons come to world. You're the last chance to save the world of course. There is a hope to get one egg without a spell on it. The hatched dragon will be yours and help you defeat red dragons and their master.

In this old-school game you're a dragon rider. Fly higher than an enemy to hit the skeleton rider. It will change to egg. Wait a while and trample it to ashes!

Note: demo version will not be updated and shows version 1.0 of the game only.
